Dear Frank:
I have your note of January 3rd and I am somewhat concerned by your mention
of the series of "The Investigator". If this is the program that I think it is,
it is a single one hour documentary which was broadcast by the Canadian
Broadcasting Corporation on June the 4th of last year and which brought
about a Parliamentary Inquiry. It is now being bootlegged in the United
States because the rights could not be procured from the CBC. Outside
of the implications of the script being written by a writer who was
reportedly deported from the United States and the fact that no network
in this country has so far touched the program, there is always the question
of our relationship with the CBC. I hope, therefore, that if this is the
program that you have in mind, that careful consideration be given to this
by the network Subcommittee before any acceptance or any arrangement is
made to broadcast an illegal version.
I have spent the morning with Hovey and drove him to Idlewild for his return
